original_text:
Therefore I cut you in pieces with my prophets,
    I killed you with the words of my mouth—
    then my judgments go forth like the sun.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 선지자들로 그들을 치고 내 입의 말로 그들을 죽였노니 내 심판은 빛처럼 나오느니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore I cut you in pieces with my prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 내 선지자들로 너를 찢으니

sentences.original_text: I killed you with the words of my mouth
then my judgments go forth like the sun
